resources.string:
PosyanduCare is an Android-based application aimed at assisting health services in Posyandu. The feature of this application is the calculation of childrens height and child data management. Users can create, view, edit, and delete child data according to their preferences.

This application is created to fulfill the assessment task of the Mobile Programming course. 

Copyright @ 2024 Ihsan Muhammad Iqbal
All rights reserved.
Lets calculate our childs height to measure whether their height is tall, normal, or short (stunting)! The calculation results refer to the standards set by the World Health Organization (WHO).

Childs data
Height: %1$s cm
Age: %2$s years old
Gender: %3$s
---------------
The child is categorized as %4$s
